name: INTERVENTION_FLO
description: Flowsheet rows which are documented when this Care Plan Intervention is documented.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the care plan intervention record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LPI_FLO_ID
columns.description: This item stores flowsheet row (FLO) IDs which are documented when this care plan intervention is documented.

columns.name: LPI_FLO_ID_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.
